abstract: Shares of the European aerospace giants EADS and BAE Systems tumbled on Thursday as investors reacted negatively to the announced merger talks between the two companies.
snippet: Shares of the European aerospace giants EADS and BAE Systems tumbled on Thursday as investors reacted negatively to the announced merger talks between the two companies.

headline.main: Investors Wary Over Giant Aerospace Deal

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
